name: Music_538.wav
keywords: ['electric guitar lick', 'pop rock', 'electric guitar chord plucking', 'mellow', 'laid-back jazzy rock', 'simple jazzy rock drumming', 'organ chords', 'smooth']
caption: The song has a laid-back, unfussy feel to it. There are various instruments layered to form a smooth, groovy, yet mellow song. The song would be categorized as pop rock, owing to the electric guitar lick and prominent electric guitar chord plucking. There's also an organ and an electric piano. The singer sounds soulful but relaxed.
